attributes.action: Amend the Sexual Discrimination Act to include charity events
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My fiancé David Johns died at the age of 31, because of cancer. Me and my Mom wanted to run the Race for Life with friends. But I have found out that I cannot enter on the grounds of the fact I am a man, we find this disgusting and it's not classed as sexual discrimination. This surely cannot be right, in today’s equality society. A amendment to the Sexual Discrimination Act is needed.
